name: Variation 1
description: This variation is derived from CC Generative Art. The main idea is to generate a layered, overlapping pattern where some shapes are filled with random bright colors while others remain outlines, creating a visually rich and dynamic abstract pattern.

name: Variation 2
description: This variation is derived from CC Generative Art. The main idea is to create a more structured and grid-like pattern where shapes are aligned in rows and columns, looking like a mosiac in a church window.
